name: Anime Girl Puzzles
description:
The anime girls are excited to see you!
Solve jigsaw puzzles featuring girls from around the world, showing off their favorite outfits and poses just for you.
It's been a long time since the girls have met a smart puzzle-solver. Will you be the one to impress them?

Enjoy a selection of 24 anime puzzles, expandable to over 200 with DLC.
With intuitive gameplay, Anime Girl Puzzles is accessible to both newcomers and puzzle enthusiasts.
Play the game your way, with a wide variety of jigsaw puzzle sizes and modes. Enjoy a leisurely experience, or face a challenging test!
Solve puzzles to earn Steam achievements and unlock hidden bonus images.

So what are you waiting for? Come meet the girls!
